current.block_about_item_1_content:
We take your piano to places others simply cannot go

Vintage Vibe is an electric piano retailer and restoration and repair shop. We draw inspiration from the classic electric pianos of the 1970’s and mix that with our own passion and experience to create a piano that looks beautiful and sounds even better.

Our focus is in quality over quantity. We only work on three types of pianos – Rhodes, Wurlitzers and Clavinets – and that means we are in a position to be experts in our field. That focus, along with over 15 years of learning, tweaking, and perfecting our craft ensures that every piano that goes out the door is of the absolute highest quality.

In addition to repairs, we are also the leading manufacturer and supplier of after-market parts for each of these three pianos to ensure that every part we use and sell meets our standard. Every piece that comes out of our shop – power supplies, reeds, pedals, keys, and tines to name a few – is of the highest quality, and having that kind of inventory means you’re not stuck waiting for your piano while a part is in the mail.

Our headquarters has been designed to ensure that every piano gets the attention and love it deserves. Before we begin assembling a piano, every piece of wood and metal that goes into it is cut and formed in our fabrication shop. Once every piece is ready, the piano is hand-assembled on our main floor. Finally, the piano moves to the tuning room where it is carefully fine-tuned and voiced.

By being hands-on in every step of the process from construction and assembly to tuning and polishing, we ensure that every piano meets our standard of excellence. Every detail matters to us because that is what our customers expect and deserve.
current.block_about_item_2_content:
Making our small world a closer community

We believe that Vintage Vibe should be more than just a for-profit company. Our customers have given us the privilege of doing what we love, and the joy that we feel for giving back keeps us balanced.

Our passion is making exquisite electric pianos. Our purpose is sharing our knowledge with anyone interested in learning and giving back to those less fortunate than ourselves.

That’s why a portion of profits earned by Vintage Vibe goes to charities and non-profit organizations. We want to make a difference in the world through our conscious business practices and to build a closer community of musicians and friends who share the idea that we can make difference by helping others.

We also believe that our responsibility to you, the customer, does not end when your Vintage Vibe piano leaves our shop. We’ve created a YouTube series dedicated to guiding you through an installation process and sharing tips to help you get the most out of your instrument, and our experts are always happy to answer questions both on the phone and on our Facebook page.

Above all else, we want to provide the best experience for you. You are in the family, and you should feel like you’re family. We do our best to look out for family.
current.block_about_item_3_content:
Realizing the future only the past could dream of

Our story begins in 1997 when founder Chris Carroll opened Vintage Vibe in New York City. Back then Chris specialized in renting out pianos to recording studios around the city, but he soon grew tired of the noise and crowds of the Big Apple and moved to the quieter confines of New Jersey. No longer content with just renting out pianos, he converted his new garage into a space for building and repairing the instruments he loved.

It wasn’t long before the music world took notice of the quality of piano coming out of that garage, and Chris quickly realized that demand was going to outpace his little shop. He began assembling a team whose expertise was only surpassed by their passion and attention to detail, and then moved the entire operation into a 6,500 square-foot facility in Rockaway, NJ that Vintage Vibe still calls home to this day.

In the years since that move, Vintage Vibe has become the leading electro-mechanical piano builder in the world, and the go-to source for Rhodes, Wurlitzer, and Clavinet piano repairs. We are also the largest manufacturer of aftermarket parts in the world – everything from bodies and keys to tines and strings - which puts us in the best position to thoroughly restore your piano to a pristine condition.

Vintage Vibe currently has a team of 10 master technicians, fabricators, and assemblers and each member of our team is driven by our love and dedication to making the finest pianos in the world. The products of our passion are on proud display in Vintage Vibe’s on-site showroom and on concert stages across the globe with bands like Lynryd Skynrd and Bon Iver. We are here to go beyond expectations and offer back the abundance we have been given.
